author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3188.  Mergeinfo on switched targets/subtrees should elide
This was merged to branch in r31185 and later reverse-merged so that
it will be a 1.5.1 candidate and not part of 1.5.0

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #2721: don't croak on invalid dates in 'log' and 'blame'.
Let the commands be useful even when some revisions' dates are corrupt.

author: hwright
msg: Fix segfault when svn_ra_open3 is passed a bogus URL such as 'bogusURL'.
Not possible to make svn(1) segfault with this, so can wait for 1.5.1.

author: hwright
msg: Update date for 1.5.0, and add section for 1.5.1.
